intent_atoms.description: Build random access table parsing so fragment indexing metadata is available across ISOInspectorKit, CLI, and UI flows.
Random access tables are implemented for mfra/tfra/mfro fragments and accessible in all three flows (ISOInspectorKit, CLI, UI).
The implementation must be completed before the next tasks can proceed.
Secure licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads and refresh regression baselines once approvals land.
Licensing approvals are obtained for all listed codecs and assets.

functional_units.name: Random Access Table Parsing
functional_units.description: Builds random access table parsing so fragment indexing metadata is available across ISOInspectorKit, CLI, and UI flows.

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing Integration
